page.title: 08 DOUGLAS COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: In Douglas housing estate there is a community centre for the use of the residents.On offer there are games and clubs like the bowling club,sewing and woodwork club,games room,cooking classes and a gym.Many people go to the different classes and clubs each week.The Centre opened in 1968/69.The O.A.P. club offers free outings.The clubs are open from Monday to Friday and it is very popular.There are clubs for all ages e.g.5_11,12_14,15_18.Charges are reasonable with annual fees,then daily charges.
